examples: Ephedra brevifoliata Ghahr. in Bull. Jard. Bot. Nation. Belg., 44(1-2): 23 (1974). Origanum strobilaceum Mobayen & Ghahr. in Bull. Soc. Bot. France 125(7-8): 389. 1978, as 'A. Gahraman'
source: D.H. Kent 1990. Index Herbariorum ed.8.  Obit. in Iranian J. Bot., 14(2):  2 pages before p.81 (2008), incl. portr.
